name: Donna Born In Roma Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Blackcurrant, Jasmine Grandiflorum, Bourbon Vanilla.Fragrance Description:This is a warm floral fragrance inspired by Roman street style and edgy haute couture. A trio of jasmine flowers and sparkling blackcurrant fuse with warm vanilla and rich woods to create a scent that captures the essence of modern femininity..About the Bottle:Designed with the iconic Valentino stud across the exterior, the luxe fragrance bottle stands out from the rest. The roughly studded exterior, an ode to the edgy fashion house and Roman architecture, is contrasted by the delicate, feminine ladiesu2019 perfume within..About the Fragrance:The values and personality of the iconic haute couture fashion house come to life through this experiential floral perfume for women. The sweet floral women's fragrance held within the studded bottle beautifully contrasts with the edgy design inspired by Roman architecture.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Isoeugenol, Methyl Anthranilate, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Citral, Farnesol, Eugenol, Ci 14700/Red 4, Ci 60730/Ext. Violet 2.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz/ 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The pink packaging on this travel perfume is so cute and perfect to carry on the go in a bag. In terms of the scent, I mainly detect the jasmine, as it predominantly smells like a floral on me. It is quite strong on me when first applied, but it mellows out after about an hour. I do prefer this fragrance after it dries down and the floral scent softens a bit. Overall, it is a pretty, clean, springy and feminine fragrance.

reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful scent. it's floral but more calm and sexy smelling. Not at all that cheap, sweet smell that some floral have. Love it!! so feminine, the smell and bottle. Sometimes I mix with 'Myth' by Brooklyn Ellis, for a whole new scent!

reviews.review_text: This is the perfect scent for me. I am in love with how amazing this smalls without it being too overwhelming. I normally love fresh scent. However, warm floral tones are captivating yet subtle. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand the hype with this perfume. It is SICKENINGLY sweet. I was hoping the scent would change once dried down but it just got stronger. The smell gives me flashbacks of being car sick in a hot car that had a vanilla scented little trees auto air freshener lol.

reviews.review_text: Screaming, Crying, Throwing up!!  This is THE perfume for me when I want to channel my Bad B energy. I got so many compliments whenever I used this. Plus it lasts the whole day!! Use it as its own or combined it with another scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a nice scent, I sprayed it on in store and let it dry down a bit. I did purchase it initially but ended up returning it (didnu2019t even open it to use) because as I smelled it more as it dried down I canu2019t quite putt finger on it but it just has a chemically after smell that I didnu2019t care for.

reviews.review_title: This perfume should be on your basket

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this I didn't know how to describe what I was smelling, so much was happening. After a quick dry down I was able to smell a rich vanilla blonde woods type of scent. 5 hours later it's still going strong (it is a stronger scent) and if I really try to focus I can smell the blackcurrant and vanilla with a sharp scent that reminds me of a hospital, but that's only if I put my nose up to my arm and sniff hard. I do enjoy this one, it makes me feel like a rich person walking the streets of Rome. I did receive this as a Gratis and these are my honest thoughts as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Be careful ordering this online- my nozzle was broken (customer service was great in helping me with options) however it might be worth going into the store to make sure yours works.

reviews.review_text: I am so picky when it comes to perfumes, I probably smelt 20 different scents in Sephora and this was the only one I liked. I previously bought the original miss dior fragrance but returned it a couple days later after hating the smell after a while. It smells very sweet and girly, it reminds me of a Victorias Secret scent which I love. Highly recommend, this oneu2019s definitely worth your money a lot of the other high end ones smell the same.

I was using Gucci Flora Magnolia, which also smells amazing. Before that, it was YSL Mon Paris, and a few others that I liked here and there.. but THIS.. THIS RIGHT HERE.. wheeewEE! Get you some, you will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_text: I tried this scent in a sample kit and knew I wanted it so I exchanged the voucher for this travel size. I happen to have a few other travel size perfumes at home that I havenu2019t used so when theyu2019re next to each other I noticed a difference in size. I took the cover off and set them side by side which shown that this one is significantly smaller and also not full. I havenu2019t used either of these in the photo. Feel a little scammy. Is it truly 10ml?

reviews.review_title: I personally don't care to smell masculine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Valentino Voce Viva has become my signature scent and I get soooo many compliments on it so, when I saw this Born in Roma as a free sample, I wanted to try it too.  I applied it before work and am literally embarrassed that I did.  This smells so much like a men's cologne I can't even believe it.  I went to the website to confirm that the version I selected as a free sample was a perfume for women and it is.  I will say that if I smelled it on a guy, I might like it but this is 100% not for me.

reviews.review_title: Valentino Donna Born In Roma Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received with a purchase I made a sample of Valentino Donna Born in Roma. I know this fragrance has been out for a while, but I never got around to trying it. This fragrance is from the floral family. The key notes you will pick up are as follows Black Currant, Jasmine, and Bourbon Vanilla. This fragrance to me because of the floral notes is the epitome if femininity. This scent does have staying power. I often did receive many compliments when I wore this perfume. I did like this fragrance but not my favorite. I will repurchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOOOOOOOOOVE IT! Best ever. I'm so obsessed that I bought this as a gift for my mom, and she was just fascinated.

I was so excited about this highly rated Valentino perfume but unfortunately I didnu2019t like the scent.  Iu2019m 29 years old but it reminds me of something a single women in her 30s/40s would wear on a night out to the bar/club. Itu2019s also kinda masculine so I can see why women claim to get many compliments from men. Iu2019m not really a going out party person, so I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s ok. Iu2019m looking for a perfume that smells just like the old Gucci envy, the clear bottle with the pink on it. Not the green one. The this almost smells the same but itu2019s missing something which makes it smell not as good to me. My daughter loves it though. Super floral so if you like those scents youu2019ll love this.

I bought the travel size, but after wearing it every day now, I'm definitely getting the big bottle! It's a date night type of scent ud83eude77

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the vanilla dry down which starts to come through around the 4 hour mark, but the fragrance itself isn't anything unique. It smells similar to many other syrupy fragrances that were launched around the same time as this was. Very feminine (scent as well as that pink packaging/bottle), very fruity, reminds me of baby powder meets pink sugar AFTER that lovely jasmine note has appeared (around the 10 minute mark) and then died down. Longevity and projection are both excellent. Very much a 'safe bet' generic kind of fragrance, like I say nothing unique here, but it's a compliment-getter and I wear it often!     ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxeu2019 u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_text: It smells incredibly luxurious and lasts all day. I get countless compliments every time I wear it. Sprayed at 2:00 PM, and by 10:56 PM, the scent still lingers on my clothes. This is now my top perfume.  Highly recommended!
